message: Let's get this started! I'll take 90% of the initial amount, and you can have 10%. It's a fair starting point, don't you think?
Meet me halfway, let's start with a balanced split!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more considering the inflation. How about I take 60% and you take 40%?
You're pushing for more, but I'm not budging. This is my counteroffer, take it or leave it!
I'm trying to find a middle ground, but I think I can do better than 30%. How about I take 45% and you take 55%?
